# [Interview #849: Memories of Light, Entry #14](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=849#14)

#### Day 14

*That*
, she replied back,
*is something one should never,*
never
*say to an Aes Sedai. Ever.*
(p. 700)
